item.title: BTC-E May Be Vulnerable To A Funds Duplication Bug
item.description:
BTC-E May Be Vulnerable To A Funds Duplication Bug

In the light of the Bitfinex hack, other cryptocurrency exchanges are facing a lot of scrutiny right now. BTC-E is being targeted by some people who want to exploit the exchange and see if they can obtain free funds.

item.title: Ethereum Classic Price Technical Analysis - Continue Selling ETC - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Ethereum Classic Price Technical Analysis - Continue Selling ETC - NEWSBTC

Ethereum classic price moved down against Bitcoin, and formed a new weekly low. ETC/BTC currently remains under selling pressure. Ethereum classic price moved down against Bitcoin, and formed a new weekly low. ETC/BTC currently remains under selling pressure. Ethereum classic price remained in a downtrend against Bitcoin, and it looks like it may continue to move down.

item.title: Betway Casino Review
item.description:
Betway Casino Review

Betway Casino is a comprehensive site that has all the features required to rub shoulders with the best online casinos in the world. The wide variety of games includes traditional favourites like blackjack and roulette, along with modern slot games such as Immortal Romance and The site itself has a user-friendly interface, and can be played from desktop, laptop or mobile.

item.title: Syscoin Hires Christopher Marsh To Establish Their Business Presence
item.description:
Syscoin Hires Christopher Marsh To Establish Their Business Presence

Cryptocurrency projects are evolving at an accelerated pace. Syscoin, often overlooked by most cryptocurrency enthusiasts, is a vibrant ecosystem that holds a lot of merits. The team recently introduced Christopher Marsh as their new Head of Business development, which will help put Syscoin on the corporate map, among other things.

item.title: $16 million worth of bitcoin to be auctioned by U.S.
item.description:
$16 million worth of bitcoin to be auctioned by U.S.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Watch; Scalping The European Session - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Watch; Scalping The European Session - NEWSBTC

Here's a look at what we are focusing on in the bitcoin price this morning. It is Wednesday morning, and time to take a look at what happened to the bitcoin price over the night, and how we can interpret this action moving into today's European session.

item.title: Another Malicious Breadwallet Clone Appears In The Apple App Store
item.description:
Another Malicious Breadwallet Clone Appears In The Apple App Store

More and more fake Bitcoin wallets continue to pop up in the Apple App Store. Things have gotten so out of hand; it appears there is a new one every single day now. The latest malicious app is called Breadwallet - Bitcoin Wallet by Bitcoin Wallet, and should be avoided at all costs.

item.title: Copay & GreenAddress Scramble to Stop Google from Storing Your Private Keys
item.description:
Copay & GreenAddress Scramble to Stop Google from Storing Your Private Keys

Bitpay's open source wallet Copay announced Tuesday that they have fixed a security flaw in Android phones running version six, codenamed 'Marshmallow.' Simultaneously, popular Bitcoin web and mobile wallet, GreenAddress, has encountered the same problem and is actively working on a solution.
